meanings.sent1: Today is the windiest day of the year.
meanings.sent2: The top of the mountain is always the windiest spot.
meanings.sent3: The windiest scarecrow in the field kept losing its hat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the windiest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The windiest road led us to the hidden valley.

meanings.definition: Having or characterized by a lot of wind.
meanings.sent1: The beach is the windiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The windiest days make flying a kite so much fun.
meanings.sent3: The windiest tree in the forest danced wildly in the storm.
meanings.sent4: His words were the windiest, but lacked sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The windiest corner of the park is perfect for a picnic.

meanings.definition: Moving or causing to move in a curving or twisting course.
meanings.sent1: The river took the windiest path through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The windiest road in the countryside is also the most scenic.
meanings.sent3: The windiest roller coaster made everyone scream with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were the windiest on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The windiest stream carved a beautiful path through the meadow.
